text: Egh ofa gamir gumazir 7pla mɨkemeghtɨ, me vaghvagh sɨghar sipsipɨn apuribar kombar ingariziba inigh, Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiamɨn faragh mangɨ. Eghtɨ namba 7 aruemɨn, nɨ uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko 7plan dughiabar nguibam gighu daru. Eghtɨ ofa gamir gumaziba me sɨghabagh ivi ia ko nguibam gighu daru.
